name: TRON (TRX)
quickSteps: Choose direction on this page: TRX → XMR in the widget.
Check the quote: live rate, fees, limits, and lock window.
Enter your XMR address from a self-custody wallet and verify it.
Send the exact TRX amount and wait for confirmations.
Receive XMR; rotate addresses if you want extra discretion.
